TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EastAsianLunisolarCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
Public MustInherit Class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar Inherits Calendar
public ref class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar abstract : System::Globalization::Calendar
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EastAsianLunisolarCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示一种日历，它将时间分为月、日、年和纪元，并且其日期基于太阳和月亮的循环。

span.span: Represents a calendar that divides time into months, days, years, and eras, and has dates that are based on cycles of the sun and the moon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了阳历年和农历月以外， 类还支持年的甲子循环（每隔60年重复一次）。The class supports the sexagenary cycle of years (which repeats every 60 years) in addition to solar years and lunar months. 日历中的每个阳历年都与甲子年相关联（请参阅 ）、天体茎（参见 ）和陆地分支（请参阅 ）。Each solar year in the calendar is associated with a Sexagenary Year (see ), a Celestial Stem (see ), and a Terrestrial Branch (see ). > [!NOTE] > 有关在 .NET Framework 中使用 类和其他 calendar 类的信息，请参阅使用[日历](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars). 一年中的任何月份后可以有闰月，月份可以有闰日。A year can have a leap month after any month of the year, and a month can have a leap day. 例如， 方法返回一个正整数，该整数指示与指定日期关联的月份。For example, the method returns a positive integer that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果该年的第八个月和第九个月之间有一个闰月，则 方法将为第八个月返回8，为第八个月返回9，在第9个月返回10个月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month. 每个 都支持一组日历。Each supports a set of calendars. 目前，派生自 的任何阴阳历类都不由 类支持的任何区域性使用。Currently, none of the lunisolar calendar classes that derive from is used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此，此类和派生自该类的类只能用于计算东亚阴阳历日历中的日期。Therefore, this class and those that derive from it can be used only to calculate dates in the East Asian lunisolar calendars. 此类支持多个 "获取" 方法，用于描述阴阳历所用术语中的 ，以及从阴阳历数据转换为 的 方法。This class supports several "get" methods to describe a in the terms used by lunisolar calendars, and the method to convert from lunisolar calendar data to a .

span.span: Working with Calendars

related.span: 示例：日历周范围实用工具

span.span: Sample: Calendar Week Range Utility

override this.AddMonths : DateTime * int -> DateTime

param.name: time
param.span: ，将向其添加 。

span.span: The to which to add .

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的月数。

span.span: The number of months to add.

summary.span: 计算与指定日期相距指定月数的日期。

span.span: Calculates the date that is the specified number of months away from the specified date.

returns.span: 一个新的 ，通过在 参数中添加指定的月数得到。

span.span: A new that results from adding the specified number of months to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果结果中的日不是生成的年份中的有效日期，则生成的 的日期部分会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在这种情况下，日期部分将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 如果生成的月份超出指定的 的年份，则生成的 的年份部分会受到影响。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年份在指定 的纪元外，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的 的时间部分与指定的 保持相同。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是10月（包含31天），指定的日期是该月的第几天，而 `months` 参数的值为6，则生成的年份比指定的年份多一，生成的月份是四月，而结果日是 thirtieth day，这是四月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the thirty-first day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the thirtieth day, which is the last day in April. 如果 `months` 参数的值为负，则生成的 早于指定的 。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的 值的 属性始终等于 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以通过调用 方法来保留 `time` 参数的 属性，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)]

exception.span: 结果超出了 支持的范围。

span.span: The result is outside the supported range of a .
is less than -120000 or greater than 120000.
-or-
is less than or greater than .

span.span: A new that results from adding the specified number of years to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果结果中的日不是生成的年份中的有效日期，则生成的 的日期部分会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在这种情况下，日期部分将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所得 的月份部分保持与指定 相同。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年份在指定 的纪元外，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的 的时间部分与指定的 保持相同。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，2月有28天，在闰年有29天时除外。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年中2月20日，而 `years` 参数的值为1，则生成的日期将是下一年2月20日。If the specified date is the twenty-ninth day of February in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date will be the twenty-eighth day of February in the following year. 如果 `years` 为负数，则生成的 早于指定的 。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的 值的 属性始终等于 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以通过调用 方法来保留 `time` 参数的 属性，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)]

exception.span: 结果超出了 支持的范围。

summary.span: 计算指定日期中的年中日期。

span.span: Calculates the day of the year in the specified date.

returns.span: 一个从 1 到 354（在平年中）或从 1 到 384（在闰年中）的整数，用于表示 参数中指定的年中日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 354 in a common year, or 1 through 384 in a leap year, that represents the day of the year specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的某一天定义为从该年的第一天开始的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，在第一个月的第一天 返回1，在上个月的最后一天 返回该年份中的总天数，这与 返回的值相同。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by .

span.span: Calculates the leap month for the specified year and era.

span.span: A positive integer from 1 through 13 that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.
-or-

returns.span: 如果此日历不支持闰月，或者 和 参数未指定闰年，则为零。

span.span: Zero if this calendar does not support a leap month, or if the and parameters do not specify a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持闰月的日历中，闰月可以出现在某个月之后或在一年中的任何月份之后。In a calendar that supports a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如， 方法返回一个从1到13的数字，用于指示与指定日期关联的月份。For example, the method returns a number from 1 through 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果该年的第八个月和第九个月之间有一个闰月，则 方法将为第八个月返回8，为第八个月返回9，在第9个月返回10个月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以将当前日历中的任何日期转换为公历日期。The method can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 以后可以使用公历日期来比较不同日历中的日期或在特定日历中创建等效日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

param.name: year
param.span: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 将指定的年份转换为四位数的年份。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year.

returns.span: 一个包含 参数的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 属性来确定相应的纪元。The method uses the property to determine the appropriate century. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 如果传递了一个两位数的年份值（小于100），则会使方法根据表示相应世纪的 值将值转换为四位值。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供了一个四位数的年份值，该范围在支持的日历范围内以 ，则该方法将返回实际输入值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供了一个在支持的日历范围之外的四位数值，或者如果它提供负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了此日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许将两位数的年份正确翻译为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，在公历中，如果将此属性设置为2029，则100年范围是从1930到2029。For example, in the Gregorian calendar, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，两位数值30被解释为1930，而两位数字的值29则解释为2029。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 此属性的初始值派生自控制面板的 "区域和语言选项" 部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，在 的生命周期内，该信息可能会更改。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不会自动检测系统设置中的更改。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.

span.span: The current is read-only.

exception.span: 位于设置操作中的值小于 99 或大于当前日历中受支持的最大年份。

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than 99 or greater than the maximum supported year in the current calendar.
